text: @kimguilfoyle @JoeBiden Is that the same lady who contracted covid19 because she belongs to a party that thinks that coronavirus was a hoax? So they wouldn't wear a mask? And their president advised the American citizens to consume bleach by drinking it or injecting it? Alright! Great source if advice.
